title: FinZero: Launching Multi-modal Financial Time Series Forecast with Large Reasoning Model
summary: This paper introduces FinZero, a framework for multi-modal financial time series forecasting using a large reasoning model. It addresses the challenges of information loss from data standardization and limitations of fixed variable numbers or lookback window lengths in traditional time series models.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the paper focuses on "Financial Time Series Forecast" and "Multi-modal" data, which aligns with the "Spatio Temporal" (primarily temporal) and "Contextual dataset" aspects of the query. While not explicitly a point process, the temporal nature is relevant.
